All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
MailPlugin
A plugin that sends notifications by email You can configure the SMTP server in application.properties The email can contain a message, a subject and a list of receivers
MailResource
A separated resource that sends notifications by email and stores the notification in the database
MsTeam
 
MsTeamsPlugin
 
MsTeamsResource
 
NotificationData
 
NotificationFactory
The notification factory interface
NotificationFactoryImpl
The notification factory
NotificationRateLimitingFilter
A filter that limits the number of requests per minute
NotificationScheduler
The Notification Scheduler
NotificationScheduler.NotificationJob
The notification job Executes the notification service after the notification is triggered
NotificationService
The notification service interface
Notifier
The notifier entity This entity is used to store the notification data for each user
NotifierResource
The notifier resource
NotifierView
 
PluginDecorator
A plugin decorator It is used to decorate a notification service with additional functionality It is used in the MailPlugin to send notifications by email It is used in the MsTeamsPlugin to send notifications by webhook in ms teams It is used in the WhatsAppPlugin to send notifications by whatsapp It is used in the TwilioSMSPlugin to send notifications by sms It is used in the TwilioCallPlugin to send notifications by voice It is used in the SmsPlugin to send notifications by sms using a smpp server
SmsPlugin
 
SmsResource
 
Startup
 
TwilioCallPlugin
A plugin that phones a list of numbers using Twilio
You can configure the Twilio account in application.properties The call can contain a message and a list of receivers
TwilioCallResource
A separated resource that sends notifications by SMS and stores the notification in the database
TwilioConfig
The Twilio configuration
TwilioSMSPlugin
A plugin that sends notifications by SMS using Twilio You can configure the Twilio account in application.properties The SMS can contain a message and a list of receivers
TwilioSMSResource
A separated resource that sends notifications by SMS and stores the notification in the database
User
 
WhatsAppPlugin
 
WhatsAppProperties
 
WhatsAppResource
